org.helm.editor.data
Class GraphManager

java.lang.Object
  org.helm.editor.data.GraphManager

public class GraphManager
extends java.lang.Object

Keeps track of how many sequences and chemical structures in the current graph each graph should associate with a graph manager

Author:
Hongli Li
